Flow.description:
DB: 18 july - compartmentalise
Flow Description: Flow to Upload Pre-Approval Opp documents, launched from Wrap Up Opportunity H2 (main flow that houses entire skeleton of working opps)
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.

formulas.name: Link_Bond
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!bondOppIdVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Bond Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: Link_PreApproval
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!paIdOppVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Pre-Approval Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: outstandingDocsMain
formulas.expression: IF({!mainMissingID} = "ID", "ID"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingPayslip} = "Payslip", "Payslip"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingBankS} = "Bank Statement", "Bank Statement"+ BR(), null)

Flow.label: Upload PA Documents Subflow

recordLookups.name: Get_Updated_Opp_post_ready_ver
recordLookups.label: Get Updated Opp post ready ver

fields.name: missingDocsVerification_0
fields.fieldText: You have not uploaded all of the minimum required documents needed to Mark as Ready for Verification:

subflows.name: Accept_or_Override_Follow_Up_H2_0
subflows.label: Accept or Override Follow Up H2

subflows.name: Accept_or_Override_Follow_Up_H2_0_0
subflows.label: Accept or Override Follow Up H2

subflows.name: Accept_or_Override_Follow_Up_H2_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0_0
subflows.label: Accept or Override Follow Up H2

subflows.name: Close_Opportunity_Lost_or_Won_Subflow_0_0_0_0_0
subflows.label: Close Opportunity Lost or Won - Subflow

subflows.name: MC_Email_Template_Selection_Multi_select_picklist
subflows.label: MC Email Template Selection - Multi select picklist

textTemplates.name: chatterPostMessage
textTemplates.text:
<---- Customer Email Sent ---->
Template Selection: {!theTemplate}
Sent To: {!applicantFullName}
Sent From: @[{!$User.Id}]
Sent Date: {!sentTime}
